text: Richard Day Lawrence (July 31, 1930 - December 9, 2016) was a United States Army lieutenant general who served as Commanding General, 1st Cavalry Division from 1980 to 1982. He later served as president of the National Defense University from 1983 to 1986. He died in 2016.http://obituaries.tylerpaper.com/obituaries/tylerpaper/obituary.aspx?page=lifestory&pid;=183109131 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:United States Army generals Category:People from Eastland, Texas
title: Richard D. Lawrence
